MemberSignature.Value: Public Event FindCompleted As EventHandler(Of FindCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 整個尋找作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the entire find operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含所有相符服務的相關資訊。The property contains information about all matching services. 如需此事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步尋找](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample.md)。For more information about this event, see [Asynchronous Find](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample.md).

summary.span: 每次用戶端收到來自特定服務的回應時發生。

span.span: Occurs every time the client receives a response from a particular service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要在收到結果時加以處理，這個事件很實用。This event is useful if you are processing the results as they arrive. 如需此事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步尋找](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample.md)。For more information about this event, see [Asynchronous Find](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample.md).
